app.name: Health Edge
app.description: Use advanced AI to analyze symptoms, images, and sensor data for preliminary medical diagnostics.

common.offlineMessage: You're currently offline. Some features may be limited.
common.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

auth.privacyNotice: Your data is stored securely on your device
auth.signInPrompt: Sign in to save your medical information

home.welcomeMessage: How can we help you today?

profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Full Name
profile.privacyInfo: Your information is stored only on this device
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This cannot be undone.

diagnosis.startPrompt: Please describe your symptoms or medical concern
diagnosis.recordingInstructions: Record your cough or breathing for analysis
diagnosis.durationQuestion: How long have you had these symptoms?
diagnosis.severityQuestion: Rate the severity of your symptoms
diagnosis.symptomsHistory: Have you experienced these symptoms before?
diagnosis.disclaimer: This is not a medical diagnosis. Always consult a healthcare professional.
diagnosis.emergencyWarning: If you're experiencing severe symptoms, please seek immediate medical attention.
diagnosis.scanInstructions: Ensure good lighting and hold the camera steady
diagnosis.imageFailed: Failed to capture image. Please try again.
diagnosis.audioFailed: Failed to record audio. Please try again.

imageCapture.title: Image Capture
imageCapture.instruction: Take a clear picture of the affected area

audioCapture.title: Audio Recording
audioCapture.instruction: Record your cough or breathing pattern

textInput.title: Symptom Description
textInput.placeholder: e.g., I've had a persistent dry cough for 3 days, along with mild fever...

results.title: Diagnostic Results
results.highUrgency: High urgency - consult a doctor soon
results.mediumUrgency: Medium urgency - monitor and seek care if worsening
results.lowUrgency: Low urgency - can be managed at home
results.disclaimer: This is not a definitive medical diagnosis. The information provided is based on AI analysis and should be verified by a healthcare professional.

settings.title: Settings
settings.dataRetentionDescription: How long to keep your medical data on this device
settings.deleteDataConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This action cannot be undone.
settings.analyticsDescription: Help improve the app by sending anonymous usage data
settings.encryptionDescription: Encrypt sensitive medical data on your device
settings.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the application? All data will be lost.

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.message: You're currently offline. Some features may be limited.
offline.syncWhenOnline: Data will sync when you're back online

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.notMedicalAdvice: The information provided by this application is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
disclaimer.consultDoctor: Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
disclaimer.emergencyWarning: If you think you may have a medical emergency, call your doctor or emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.informationOnly: This application provides information only and should not be used for self-diagnosis.
disclaimer.privacyStatement: Your privacy is important. All data is processed on your device and is not shared without your explicit consent.
